p: Due to the abuse of some chemical additives and preservatives and their harmful effects on human health, many countries have regulated food production. For this reason, interest in studying and researching on natural preservatives and replacing chemical preservatives with natural ones has been extensively increased. In addition, the excessive use of chemical preservatives leads to the development of bacterial resistance against antibiotics. Therefore, the study of natural antimicrobials has also received medical attention (Gonçalves Cattelan et al., 2018).
